summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East Lynn Street, from 26th Avenue North on the south to approximately 190 feet east of 26th Avenue North on the north; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8287 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
